## SlideInParams type

Type representing slide in params

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SlideInParams = {
    heightDuration?: string;
    opacityDuration?: string;
    fromHeight?: string;
    toHeight?: string;
    fromOpacity?: number | '*';
    toOpacity?: number | '*';
    position?: CssPosition;
    display?: CssDisplay;
    overflow?: CssOverflow;
};
```
